original_text: When the child was eight days old, people met together to circumcise him. They wanted to call the child Zechariah. This was the same name that his father had. 1: They circumcised all baby boys in Israel on the eighth day. It means to cut off the skin from the end of the sex part of a boy or a man. For the Jews, it was a special mark. It showed that they were the people of God. Friends and people that lived near would also be there. They had a party and they gave a name to the boy. See Genesis 17. When the child was eight days old, people met together to circumcise him. They wanted to call the child Zechariah. This was the same name that his father had.
korean_text: 팔 일이 되매 아이를 할례하러 와서 그 아버지의 이름을 따라 사가랴라 하고자 하더니

sentences.original_text: When the child was eight days old
people met together to circumcise him
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 모여서 그에게 할례를 행하려고 했습니다

sentences.original_text: They wanted to call the child Zechariah
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 아이를 스가랴라고 부르려고 했습니다

sentences.original_text: This was the same name that his father had
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 그의 아버지가 가졌던 같은 이름이었습니다

sentences.original_text: They circumcised all baby boys in Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 이스라엘의 모든 남자 아기들에게 할례를 행했습니다

sentences.original_text: It means to cut off the skin
from the end of the sex part of a boy or a man
For the Jews, it was a special mark
It showed that they were the people of God
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 그들이 하나님의 백성이라는 것을 보여주었습니다

sentences.original_text: Friends and people that lived near would also be there
and they gave a name to the boy
When the child was eight days old
people met together to circumcise him
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 모여서 그에게 할례를 행하려고 했습니다

sentences.original_text: They wanted to call the child Zechariah
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 아이를 스가랴라고 부르려고 했습니다

sentences.original_text: This was the same name that his father had
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 그의 아버지가 가졌던 같은 이름이었습니다
